title: Sniper But I Recall The Role From Memory

fields.name: Spyglass:
fields.value: Target any two players. See their visits and who they were visited by.

fields.name: Rubber Ammo:
fields.value: Target a player. That player cannot vote on the next Day Phase.

fields.name: Setup (x1, Charge 75%):
fields.value: Target a player. If you attack that player in the future, it will have 1.8x Attack Power and also Rampages with 1.0x Attack Power.
